body.name: Graco 4Ever DLX 4 in 1 Car Seat, Infant to Toddler Car Seat, with 10 Years of Use, Fairmont
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 50 mins
features: 4-in-1 car seat gives you 10 years of use: seamlessly transforms from rear-facing harness car seat (4-40 pounds), to forward-facing harness car seat (22-65 pounds), to highback belt-positioning booster (40-100 pounds), to backless belt-positioning booster (40-120 pounds)
Graco ProtectPlus Engineered helps to protect your little one in frontal, side, rear and rollover crashes.
Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the height of your harness and headrest to 10 positions in one motion to ensure that your child is always properly secured
6-position recline helps keep your growing child comfy on your many journeys together
The Graco exclusive InRight LATCH attachment provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audible click to help ensure secure installation
Integrated belt lock-off for easy vehicle seat belt installation
Machine washable, RapidRemove cover removes in 60 seconds without uninstalling the seat for easy cleaning
body.description: Graco 4Ever DLX 4-in-1 Car Seat gives you 10 years of use with 1 car seat, now upgraded with 3 additional features pack and play The best-selling 4Ever you know and love now features a Rapid Remove cover, an integrated belt lock-off for easy installation and rubberized fuss free harness storage for extra accessibility. It is comfortable for your child and convenient for you as it transitions from a rear-facing harness (4-40 lbs) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lbs) to high back belt-positioning booster (40-100 lbs) to backless belt-positioning booster (40-120 lbs). The Simply Safe Adjust Harness System and 10-position headrest lets you adjust the harness and headrest together with no rethreading. The 6-position recline keeps your child comfortable, while the In Right Latch system makes installation easy. It's the only car seat you'll ever need Pack and Play.Recommended use:Children are safer riding rear-facing and should ride rear-facing as long as possible, until they reach the maximum rear-facing height or weight rating for their car seat. Then children should ride forward-facing, using the built-in harness system for as long as possible until they reach the maximum forward-facing weight or height for their car seat. At that point, children should ride in a belt-positioning booster seat. A booster is no longer needed once the vehicle seat belt fits properly, typically when they reach 4 feet 9 inches tall and are between ages 8-12. Be sure to check your local and state laws, as well as AAP and NHTSA recommendations, for car seat usage.Plush head and body inserts keep your child comfortable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the height and weight limit for this car seat? 4-in-1 seat gives you 10 years of use: seamlessly transforms from rear-facing harness car seat (4-40 lb) to forward-facing harness car seat (22-65 lb) to highback belt-positioning booster (40-100 lb) to backless belt-positioning booster (40-120 lb). What is beneficial about the InRight LATCH system? The Graco exclusive InRight LATCH attachment provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audio click cue to help ensure secure installation. What is ProtectPlus? ProtectPlus is a number of rigorous testing measurement to keep your child safe. The car seat meets or exceeds the child restraint criteria for a frontal crash test under the US FMVSS 213. How does this car seat keep my growing child comfortable? The 4Ever 4-in-1 Car Seat keeps your growing child comfortable with a 6-position recline, 10-position adjustable headrest, and Simply Safe Adjust Harness System (in which the harness and headrest adjust in one motion). Can the seat cover be removed for cleaning? Yes! The machine-washable seat cover is easy to undo without removing the harness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Only Car Seat You'll Ever Need - Graco 4Ever DLX
reviews.reviewText: Overall Rating: ★★★★★ (5 out of 5 stars)Ultimate Longevity:A Decade of Use: The Graco 4Ever DLX is by far the best car seat I've ever purchased. Its 4-in-1 design brilliantly accommodates children from infancy to toddlerhood, and even beyond. The fact that this car seat can be used for a staggering 10 years is a testament to its excellent design and durability.Safety First:Peace of Mind for Parents: As a parent, the safety of my child is my top priority. This car seat delivers on that front with its robust construction and rigorous safety testing. I feel confident and reassured every time I buckle my child in.Comfort for All Ages:Designed with Kids in Mind: From its plush inserts for infants to the adjustable headrest and recline positions for older children, the Graco 4Ever DLX ensures comfort at every stage of growth. My child seems content and relaxed, even on longer journeys.Ease of Use:User-Friendly Installation: The installation process is straightforward and secure, thanks to the clear instructions and helpful LATCH system. Adjusting the harness and headrest is a breeze, making it easy to ensure the perfect fit as my child grows.Stylish and Practical Design:Elegant and Easy to Clean: The Fairmont design is both elegant and practical. It looks great in my car and doesn't show stains easily. Plus, the removable seat cover is machine washable, making cleanup after spills a hassle-free task.Versatility and Value:Worth Every Penny: This car seat’s ability to adapt to different stages of a child's growth not only provides exceptional versatility but also makes it an excellent investment. The cost is justified by the extended use and features it offers.Conclusion:Highly Recommend to All Parents: The Graco 4Ever DLX 4 in 1 Car Seat in Fairmont is a top-tier choice for anyone looking for safety, comfort, and longevity in a car seat. It’s an investment that pays off in the long run, providing unparalleled value. We had the last model and now this one. I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT CAR SEAT!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We recently purchased the Graco All-in-One car seat, and it's been a game-changer. The installation is super easy and takes less than 2 minutes. Shipping came the next day for us and was handled well. Before installing it rear-facing, adjusting the levels for optimal comfort was straightforward. The transition from the infant seat to this convertible one happened later than we expected, but the versatility and safety features make it well worth the wait. Our 2 year old son fits so comfortably in his seat he loves it. The Graco All-in-One offers peace of mind and comfort for both infants and toddlers, making it an excellent investment in your child's safety. Don’t forget to read the manual, which was super helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I own the entire Graco Midtown collection!
reviews.reviewText: I can honestly say i am in love with the entire Graco Primer Midtown collection! I have the infant carrier, the modes 2 grow stroller, extra seat for the stroller, and i just purchased my second convertible car seat for my granddaughter thats only 3 months. Her dister has the first one @ 2.5 years old. I originally picked hers up when she was only 9 months old. I am so thankful for the Graco Primer set. The look, style, feel, features, comfort, and safety all made each piece well worth while! Very easy installation and so easy to adjust as they grow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best child carseat we've ever used
reviews.reviewText: We've bought four of these things for our kids over the years. They're safe, solid, well made, versatile, easy to install and uninstall, very adjustable, and comfortable for the kids. They're also easy to disassemble and clean when you need to do that, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great car seats, I purchased 6 of them so my wife could have 3 and I could have 3 in my car. They are safe and easy to clean and install. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat, it’s exactly like the ones in stores. High quality and comfort for my little one. Easy to install and adjust. I would definitely order it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Car seat for years of use
reviews.reviewText: We have used this car seat for both our kids. It’s very versatile and adjusts perfectly as the kids grow. The covers are all washable and go on and off fairly easily. The seat is very easy to install as it has the quick latch’s. It is a little bulky if you’re using it in a truck less than a full crew cab. The straps are sturdy and adjust very easily. The clips and clasps are strong and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat!
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Seems comfortable and fits in the seat well. I like the different recline options. Pet hair does seem to stick to it, but we have so many animals, it’s always on our clothes - so I’m not surprised. It will probably come off pretty easily with a lint roller, I just haven’t tried yet. The cup holders are detachable and really easy to pop out, so my toddler plays them if I try to leave them installed. I don’t think that’s enough of a problem to dock a star off, though.

Cadeira maravilhosa. Muito confortável, material de qualidade, acabamento excelente, espaçosa. Minha bebê usava o bebê conforto mas se sentia muito desconfortável, nessa cadeira ela fica super confortável. Valeu a pena o investimento, tendo em vista que também poderá ser usada por muitos anos!

Esta muy amplia y cómoda, yo veo q mi bebe esta feliz, bien acomodada y segura en la silla. Los broches son fáciles de abrochar por que tuve otra silla que los tenía muy duros y tardaba en asegurarla. La compre por que mi auto no tiene isofix y se ajusta con cinturón de seguridad y esta silla tiene las 2 opciones. Lean el instructivo bien ya que como se adapta a muchas etapas del bebe tiene muchas opciones de ajuste

Me gusta el modelo y la marca se me hace de las seguras. Tengo otro asiento de la misma marca, modelo smart seat y la verdad muy todo muy bien.Recibí el paquete muy bien con año ya de fabricación, sin embargo a mi parecer no lo veo tan mal, ya que en tiendas departamentales luego esa es la fecha en la que te lo entregan.
Adorei a cadeira é linda super macia e parece ser muito segura!
